statement.p: Explain how to find the dimension of W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} -2 \\ 1 \\ -4 \\ -1 \\ -2 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 2 \\ 1 \\ -4 \\ -3 \\ 1 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 4 \\ -6 \\ 24 \\ 10 \\ 6 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 4 \\ -12 \\ 48 \\ 22 \\ 9 \end{array}\right]\right\}.
